Specimen Container(s): 6 mL LDPE vial with dispensing tip and cap
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Infopia blood glucose monitoring test systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucose Meter-Check Solution for Infopia as a glucose control material for verifying Infopia blood glucose monitoring test systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to verify the performance and correct operation of Infopia blood glucose monitoring test systems utilizing Infopia glucose test strips; for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home
